name: longer-belts-redux
title: 更长的地下传送带（对齐）
author: Peppe
description: 基于地下传送带的速度延长其距离。修复支持Bob的物流。感谢Schmendrick, Loren1350为之前的版本作出的贡献。
description_original: Extends underground belt distance based on their speed.  Fixed optional mod bob's logistics.  Credit Schmendrick, Loren1350, for past versions
